name: MagKnight
description:
Help MagKnight defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and delve dungeons through the use of the MagBlade: a sword hilt with awesome magnetic capabilities!

Controls

  • Controller (XBOX360/XBOXone)
    • Left Analog Controller -MOVE CHARACTER/MENU NAV
    • Y Button - USE  MAGNET/EQUIP WEAPON
    • B Button - DROP WEAPONS
    • A Button - DASH/BACKSTEP/MENU CONFIRM
    • X Button - ATTACK
    • Start Button - PAUSE/UNPAUSE
  • Keyboard/Mouse
    • WASD Keys - MOVE CHARACTER
    • Left Mouse Click - ATTACK/MENU CONFIRM
    • Right Mouse Click - USE MAGNET/EQUIP WEAPON
    • Space Bar - DASH/BACKSTEP
    • Left CTRL Key - DROP WEAPONS
    • Escape Key - PAUSE/UNPAUSE
